TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UITextViewDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

Docs.summary: Indicates the text or text attributes in the specified UITextView were changed by the app user.

Attribute.AttributeName: ObjCRuntime.Deprecated(ObjCRuntime.PlatformName.iOS, 10, 0, ObjCRuntime.PlatformArchitecture.None, "Use the 'ShouldInteractWithTextAttachment' overload that takes 'UITextItemInteraction' instead.")

Docs.param: The instance on which this method operates.
Docs.summary: Whether the specified UITextView should allow user interaction with the specified text attachment in a given range of text.
